name: Worldwide R&D paid for by the company and performed by the company and others, by industry and company size: 2022
description: Worldwide R&D paid for by the company and performed by the company and others, by industry and company size: 2022

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification is based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded $50,000 or more of R&D and are not comparable with estimates published for years prior to 2018.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey, 2022.
